Package syntax

This package provides all syntactic structures needed in addition to Log4KR, that is a data structure for first-order knowledge bases as well as other classes for formulas and groundings.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExistentialQuantification
    Data structure for an existentially quantified formula.
    FullGroundSubstitution
    Extension of GroundSubstitution, adding the missing support for formulas of type Tautology.
    GroundingOperator
    Extension of ConstraintBasedGroundingOperator, providing an unconstrained grounding operator with additional utility methods for simple instantiations.
    Quantification
    Data structure for a quantified formula.
    RelationalKnowledgeBase
    A first-order knowledge base consists of a set of conditionals and a set of closed formulas, called facts.
    RelationalKnowledgeBaseReader
    This class can read a first-order knowledge base from a textual representation and checks whether it its a restricted first-order knowledge base.
    UniversalQuantification
    Data structure for an universally quantified formula.

Package syntax Description

This package provides all syntactic structures needed in addition to Log4KR, that is a data structure for first-order knowledge bases as well as other classes for formulas and groundings.
